comments_since_last_sample.body: I really want to like this makeover, but it feels like there are 3 separate styles rather than one cohesive design.
Alexandra is on fire!!!! the past year I have noticed how she has continually grown and become an even better designer.  can't wait to see what's next!!
I feel like you are being very Liberal with talking about exacto everything, I think Chico will be triggered when watching this episode
Feel better Xico!
It looks beautiful - great job!  The bed area is gorgeous and I love the wallpaper.  You really worked your magic to transform this space Alexandra!

As someone who works alot on a computer, I would never ever ever ever change the desk chair with a dining chair. It is not healthy! You should never do that. Sitting for 6 to 8 hours a day needs a soecial chair for that. You always replace comfortable with look, why?
Awesome, love it!
I loved your use of colour to separate the spaces yet they all still tie together
Good job !!!
HOLY LOOK AT THAT VIEW
This is my favourite makeover! Great job!!!!
Prayers for healing of your hand Chico.
Great job!

Wow - tough criteria not being able to paint or put a single hole in the walls! But you did it!! AMAZING JOB!! and so fresh and pretty too! xoxo PS - I'm totally going to copy the hanging plants divider! ;-)
I also want a makeover
Amazing
you knocked it out of the park with this one, Alexandra!
Alexandra...you NAILED it! This studio is beautiful...full of color and warmth...as your client said..."I'm home".
Really cool Alexandra! Very pleasent to watch! Great ideas!
The best part of the decor is the bedspread!!  The best part of the video is James!!
